document:
<sentence id="s2" text="GPX2 and li>TXNRD3 showed a higher expression and li>GPX3, li>SELENOP, li>SELENOS, and li>SEPHS2 exhibited a lower expression in the disease tissue from adenomas and both cancer groups (li>p-values from 0.023 to AAAA0.001).">
<sentence id="s3" text="While there were no significant correlations with both Se status markers, li>SELENOF, li>SELENOK, and li>TXNRD1 tumor tissue expression positively correlated with Se, while li>TXNRD2 and li>TXNRD3 negatively correlated with li>SELENOP.">
